name: Space Invaders? (LAZdagameMaker)
description:
Space Invaders? A small game which only point is to  gain points by destroying enemy spaceships! Each spaceship has a different movement speed and also other COOL skins. Keep in mind that this is my first game so there might be a few bugs!

Next update: Spaceships Shoot Back

HOW TO PLAY: 

Move using your mouse! (Mobile Version soon!) Mobile Version just came out!

Shoot by Left Clicking the mouse or by just simply pressing Space! (Using Left Click is more recommended)

Collect points by destroying enemy spaceships.  How far can you get?

Have fun! 

v1.1 /Added Flashy (Really fast spaceship that rewards you for 3 points.

v1.2 /+Mobile Version TAP the screen to shoot. Slide  to move!

V1.3/ Fixed Some bugs.
